Comment: From reporter Elyse Wanshel:  A former Real Housewife whose tagline was “some people think I’m too much, they’re absolutely right” is officially a board member of the U.S. Holocaust Memorial Council.  In a post on his Truth Social site Monday, President Donald Trump announced five appointees to the board, and one was “Real Housewives of New Jersey” Season 7 and 8 alum Sigalit “Siggy” Flicker. The Israeli-born former matchmaker is a member of Trump’s Mar-a-Lago Club and has a connection to the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.  Link to the full article: [https://www.huffpost.com/entry/trump-appoints-former-real-housewives-of-new-jersey-star-to-holocaust-museum-board\_n\_681cb7d4e4b0b11c4979cb39?utm\_medium=Social&utm\_source=reddit&utm\_campaign=us\_main](https://www.huffpost.com/entry/trump-appoints-former-real-housewives-of-new-jersey-star-to-holocaust-museum-board_n_681cb7d4e4b0b11c4979cb39?utm_medium=Social&utm_source=reddit&utm_campaign=us_main)
Author: huffpost
